entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse He cares so much his response to a deadly virus was calling it a Dem hoax, more interested in trade talks with China and ignored all intelligence regarding the virus! You can't lie your way out of everything! #TheWorstPresidentInHistory
